law.catch_line: Merit system for local health department personnel.

text.section: The cabinet shall administer a personnel program for local health departments based on the principles of merit governing the recruitment, examination, appointment, discipline, removal, and other incidents of employment for county, city-county, and district agencies.
The cabinet shall establish policies and procedures for the personnel program through the promulgation of administrative regulations pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.
